Hot accretion flow model has been the popular model to account
for the Compton emission in the hard state of BHXRB (Done et al.
2007).In this model,the accretion geometry is composed of a hot
accretion flow inside a truncated disk (Esin et al. 1997).The preces-
sion of the hot accretion flow can modulate the Compton emission
through self-occultation,projected areaandrelativistic effects,which
